rules.title: Overloaded
rules.content: Deal +2 DMG for this instance; when targeting an active character, the target will be forcibly switched to the next character
rules.contentraw: Deal +2 DMG for this instance; when targeting an active character, the target will be forcibly switched to the next character

rules.title: Superconduct
rules.content: Deal +1 DMG for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
rules.contentraw: Deal +1 DMG for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target

rules.title: Electro-Charged
rules.content: Deal +1 DMG for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
rules.contentraw: Deal +1 DMG for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target

rules.title: Frozen
rules.content:
Deal +1 DMG for this instance. The target character receives the Frozen status:
The character cannot use Skills (Lasts until the end of this Round).
When receiving Pyro or Physical DMG, the character receives +2 DMG and removes this status in advance.
rules.contentraw: Deal +1 DMG for this instance. The target character receives the <color=#FFFFFFFF>Frozen</color> status:\nThe character <color=#FFFFFFFF>cannot use Skills</color> (Lasts until the end of this Round).\nWhen receiving {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color> or {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical</color> DMG, the character receives +2 DMG and removes this status in advance.

rules.title: Swirl
rules.content: Deal 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing characters except the target
rules.contentraw: Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> to all opposing characters except the target

rules.title: Swirl
rules.content: Deal 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
rules.contentraw: Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color> to all opposing characters except the target

rules.title: Swirl
rules.content: Deal 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
rules.contentraw: Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> to all opposing characters except the target

rules.title: Swirl
rules.content: Deal 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
rules.contentraw: Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> to all opposing characters except the target

rules.title: Crystallize
rules.content: Deal +1 DMG for this instance, grant 1 Shield point to your active character (Shield can be stacked. Max 2 points).
rules.contentraw: Deal +1 DMG for this instance, grant 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> point to your active character (Shield can be stacked. Max 2 points).

rules.title: Crystallize
rules.content: Deal +1 DMG for this instance, grant 1 Shield point to your active character (Shield can be stacked. Max 2 points).
rules.contentraw: Deal +1 DMG for this instance, grant 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> point to your active character (Shield can be stacked. Max 2 points).

rules.title: Crystallize
rules.content: Deal +1 DMG for this instance, grant 1 Shield point to your active character (Shield can be stacked. Max 2 points).
rules.contentraw: Deal +1 DMG for this instance, grant 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> point to your active character (Shield can be stacked. Max 2 points).

rules.title: Crystallize
rules.content: Deal +1 DMG for this instance, grant 1 Shield point to your active character (Shield can be stacked. Max 2 points).
rules.contentraw: Deal +1 DMG for this instance, grant 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> point to your active character (Shield can be stacked. Max 2 points).

rules.title: Burning
rules.content:
Deal +1 DMG for this instance and create a [Burning Flame]:
End Phase: Deal 1 Pyro DMG. (1 Usage. Max 2 stacks)
rules.contentraw: Deal +1 DMG for this instance and create a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Burning Flame</color>]:\nEnd Phase: Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>. (1 Usage. Max 2 stacks)

rules.title: Bloom
rules.content:
Deal +1 DMG for this instance and create a [Dendro Core]:
When you deal Pyro DMG or Electro DMG to an opposing active character, DMG dealt +2. (1 Usage)
rules.contentraw: Deal +1 DMG for this instance and create a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>]:\nWhen you deal {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> or {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> to an opposing active character, DMG dealt +2. (1 Usage)

rules.title: Quicken
rules.content:
Deal +1 DMG for this instance and create a [Catalyzing Field]:
When you deal Electro DMG or Dendro DMG to an opposing active character, DMG dealt +1. (3 Usages)
rules.contentraw: Deal +1 DMG for this instance and create a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Catalyzing Field</color>]:\nWhen you deal {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> or {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color> to an opposing active character, DMG dealt +1. (3 Usages)
